commit.message:
c-decl.c (set_block): Set NAMES and BLOCKS from BLOCK.

	* c-decl.c (set_block): Set NAMES and BLOCKS from BLOCK.
	* ch/decl.c, f/com.c, java/decl.c: Likewise.

From-SVN: r40010

+	* c-decl.c (set_block): Set NAMES and BLOCKS from BLOCK.
+
 	* varasm.c (output_constant): Recompute CODE after lang-specific fn.
